page.title: 12FARMING SAMPLE STUDIES
page.content:
Cont. from page 11. cattle or pigs.The ones that keep cattle feed them intensively and therefore need less grassland.The pigs are also intensively kept. Looking at the arable land,the major crop is wheat followed by barley.The other crops grown in the area are oil seed rape (which is increasing in acreage every year),potatoes,peas, oats,kale and fodder beet. The average size of the 12 farms studied is 147 acres. James Laughton Alexandra France Age 12
Sample Studies
Hemsworth Lanes Farm Barnsley Road,Ackworth G.R. 443150
